document_title: Stomach pain (stomach pain): Causes, symptoms, and diagnosis
subsection_name: dau-da-day.json_2_Potential complications due to stomach pain
subsection_content:
If stomach pain is still in the acute stage, most symptoms will appear suddenly but can be cured after just a few weeks. However, with a chronic condition, pain appears more frequently and is more severe. Some potentially dangerous complications that may appear include:
Stomach bleeding.; Gastric perforation; Pyloric stenosis
subsection_title: dau da day.json. Potential complications due to stomach pain
